The
Chimokami is a big three-tailed fox that resides in the grassy areas
2nd Layer of the Abyss. They mainly come out during nighttime and hunt their prey whilst they are asleep.
:hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Behaviour Details: Chimokamis mainly hunts Fuwagis but can sometimes hunt larger creatures like Hammerbeaks. They will usually flee from nearing Delvers, but will attack if one gets too close. They can however be tempted by either chicken or Fuwagi Meat. :hypers:
§#1fab44-#fcc82b-#423924§Item Drops: Due to the Chimokamis three-tailed look their
tuff is very sought after in Orths. Their
fangs can also be used similar to flint to start campfires.
:hypers:
